state: Welcome to another exciting episode of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to try to head south. Next, make an effort to go south. Then, attempt to move west. If you can accomplish that, go to the west. And then, make an effort to take a trip south. And then, take a trip west. With that over with, move west. And then, make an effort to travel north. With that over with, go north. With that over with, go to the east. Then, try to go to the north. Then, head north. And then, try to go west. And then, retrieve the stick of butter from the floor of the kitchenette. Alright, thanks! -= Spare Room =- You've entered a spare room. You can barely contain your excitement. You make out an opened suitcase. The suitcase is empty, what a horrible day! You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Spare Room =-0/1
